text: And for a moment Vimes felt almost weightless – and there was a lot of shouting going on, some way off.

passages.full_quote: <used>And for a moment Vimes</used>'s blood froze

passages.fragment: for a moment Vimes felt almost weightless – and there was a
passages.full_quote: It was a strange sensation – <used>for a moment Vimes felt almost weightless – and there was a</used> commotion behind them in the cowshed among the great spinning wheels

passages.fragment: and there was a lot of shouting
passages.full_quote: He said we was not to look, but he couldn't tell us not to listen, <used>and there was a lot of shouting</used> and I don't know what, and it upset my old mum no end

passages.fragment: was a lot of shouting going on , some way off
passages.full_quote: There <used>was a lot of shouting going on, some way off</used>
